text:
How to factor a trinomial raised to the third power by factoring out an x first

3\nFactor Gef firs\n[imath] x^{2}-4 x^{2}-5 x \quad x^{8}-4 x^{7}-5 x^{6} [/imath]\n[imath] x\left(x^{2}-4 x-6\right) \quad\left\{\begin{array}{l}x^{2}-4 x-5 \\ x^{8}-4 x^{7}-5 x^{4}\end{array}\right. [/imath][imath]x^{2}-4 x-5 [/imath] [imath] x^{8}-4 x^{7}-5 x^{4}[/imath]
